name: InstaVoice ReachMe
description: Meet InstaVoice ReachMe - an international roaming app  that helps you save roaming costs  when traveling internationally.  1. Make & receive affordable calls on international roaming  from your own number   over data/ WiFi.   2. Buy ReachMe Roaming packs as per your requirement and travel smarter.   3. Buy SIM-less numbers from Somtel Somalia, US, UK and Canada and France, and make/ receive cheap calls in the app.   All you need is an active internet connection   4. Get free and unlimited Visual Voicemail and Missed Call Alerts all in one app.   Hello WiFi Calling! Think of InstaVoice ReachMe as a WiFi calling app. Connect to a WiFi hotspot, and make and receive calls - even without the SIM card! Its like a virtual travel SIM that gives you cheap international roaming for incoming and outgoing calls.   Buy SIM-less Numbers from ReachMe Ever wanted to own a virtual number from a different country? With ReachMe Numbers, you can buy a virtual number from Somtel Somalia, US, UK, France and Canada. Make & receive calls to virtual numbers on ReachMe roaming app.  Buy ReachMe Roaming Packs - Want to buy a Roaming pack for upcoming international travel? - Choose a roaming pack (daily, weekly or monthly) based on your need.   Make & Receive Calls on International Roaming:  -Install ReachMe and buy a roaming pack -Activate international roaming mode -People call your original number -ReachMe converts the incoming call to VoIP -Make/ Receive calls in the app over an internet connection (cheap international roaming)  Unlimited Visual Voicemail & Missed Call Alerts Listen to, and manage unlimited voicemails for all your linked numbers in the app. Get free Missed Call Alerts for all your linked numbers, even if your phone is switched off or unreachable   Features at a Glance:   -Cheap International Roaming: Save roaming costs! Make and receive affordable calls over WiFi/ data, without changing numbers.  - Roaming Packs: Buy a roaming pack of your choice and enjoy cheap international roaming.  -SIM-Less Numbers: Buy virtual numbers from Somtel Somalia, USA, UK, Canada or France, and make/ receive affordable calls in the app.  -Free App-to-App Calling: Call other ReachMe users in the app over IP for free and save roaming costs. -Free Unlimited Visual Voicemail & Missed Call Alerts: What happens when you miss a call? Get a cloud-powered visual voicemail system with unlimited voicemail storage. Retrieve your voicemails and missed call alerts with ReachMe. - Voicemail Transcription: Convert voicemail to text with transcription and read them on the go.    Need Support? Want to suggest a new feature?  - Email us at reachme@instavoice.com - Tweet us @IVReachMe
